    #include<iostream>
    #include<cmath>
    using namespace std;
    int main(){
        int m,n,a,temp;
        bool flag=true;
        cin>>m>>n;
        if(n%2==0)a=n/2;
        else a=1+n/2;
        //int arr[m]={0};
        for(int i=0;i<m;i++){
            cin>>temp;
            if(temp>a)flag=false;
        }
        if(flag)cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        else cout<<"NO"<<endl;
    }
